mainEntity.name: How do I make a payment?

acceptedAnswer.text: You can make payments easily through our secure online portal using credit/debit cards or EFT. We also offer options for recurring payments and will send reminders before your due date.

mainEntity.name: How do I upgrade or change my plan?

acceptedAnswer.text: Upgrading or changing your plan is simple. Just contact our support team or visit your account dashboard online to select a new plan that fits your needs. Changes take effect immediately or on your next billing cycle.

mainEntity.name: What is the installation process like?

acceptedAnswer.text: Our professional technician will schedule a visit to install fiber optic cables and the Optical Network Terminal (ONT) at your home. The process typically takes 2-6 hours and includes testing to ensure optimal connection.

mainEntity.name: Are there any contracts or hidden fees?

acceptedAnswer.text: No contracts and no hidden fees. We offer month-to-month plans with transparent pricing so you can enjoy flexibility and peace of mind.

mainEntity.name: What coverage areas do you serve?

acceptedAnswer.text: We provide nationwide fiber coverage with ongoing network expansion to bring ultra-fast internet to more homes every day.

mainEntity.name: How can I contact customer support?

acceptedAnswer.text: Our local support team is available 24/7 via phone, email, or live chat to assist you with any questions or issues.

mainEntity.name: Do you offer a free trial or money-back guarantee?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, we offer a 30-day risk-free trial so you can experience our ultra-fast fiber internet with no commitment.

mainEntity.name: What equipment do I need for fiber internet?

acceptedAnswer.text: We provide all necessary equipment including the Optical Network Terminal (ONT) and a compatible Wi-Fi router. Our technician will install and configure everything during your appointment.

mainEntity.name: How do I ensure the best Wi-Fi performance at home?

acceptedAnswer.text: Place your Wi-Fi router in a central, open location away from interference sources. For larger homes, consider mesh Wi-Fi systems or wired connections for optimal coverage.

mainEntity.name: Can I cancel my service anytime?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, you can cancel your service at any time without penalties. Just notify our support team and we'll assist with the process.
